twilio.reply: Thanks for contacting Range. This number cannot receive text messages. Email range@caravanstudios.org. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Msg&Data rates may apply.

popupMsg: Summer is over which means Range is no longer in use until May 2015. Please take a moment to tell us how you used Range by answering a few questions in our survey.

shareMail.subject: Summer meal location sent from Range
